text: Alnilam, also called Epsilon Orionis, is a blue supergiant star and the central star of Orion's Belt in the constellation Orion. It is 42 times the Sun's diameter but over 800,000 times brighter.https://arxiv.org/abs/1511.09365 It is over 400 parsecs or 1,300 light years away.https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/1997A&A...323L..49P; == References == Category:Stars Category:Supergiants
title: Alnilam
